0011110100101000 0000111010001101 0 -> sum: 0100101110110101, cout: 0
1101101001100100 0101000111011001 0 -> sum: 0010110000111101, cout: 1

0111001001110101 1011110110100110 0 -> sum: 0011000000011011, cout: 1
